short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension creates a qrcode for the current url.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep continue watching your video or reading your post! 

Create a QR code for the current page and easily view it on your phone, without typing any url.
